name: sfpowerscript-deploysourcetoorg-task
friendlyName: Deploy a Source Directory (Source Format) to an Org
description: Deploy a directory in source format to any org using metadata api, This task is part of sfpowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Deploy a  directory or a subdirectory (the root should be  mentioned in sfdx-project.json to an org using metadata api
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the target org where the code should be deployed

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The  directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: source_directory
inputs.label: Package Directory to be deployed
inputs.helpMarkDown: The particular package directory in the project that needs to be deployed

inputs.name: checkonly
inputs.label: Validate Deployment, Do not Deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validate a deployment, but don't save to the org, Use this for Stage 1/2 CI Run's

inputs.name: ignorewarnings
inputs.label: Ignore any warning during a deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this field to ignore warnings, default behaviour results in warnings treated as errors

inputs.name: ignoreerror
inputs.label: Ignore any errors during a deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this field to ignore any errors during deployment,if enabled failed components will be ignored

inputs.name: wait_time
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: wait time for command to finish in minutes

inputs.name: validation_ignore
inputs.label: Path to the .validationignore to use during validate only deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validation only deployment has issues with certain metadata such as apexttestsuite, create a different file similar to .forceignore and use it during validate only deployment

inputs.name: testlevel
inputs.label: Test Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: The test level of the test that need to be executed when the code is to be deployed

inputs.name: specified_tests
inputs.label: Tests to be executed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a comma seperated values of Apex Test that need to be executed during this deployment

inputs.name: apextestsuite
inputs.label: Apex Test Suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Apex Test  that need to be executed during this deployment

inputs.name: isToBreakBuildIfEmpty
inputs.label: Break Build if the provided metadata folder is empty
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this field, to allow for empty folders not to break build, useful in the case of pre/post step uniformity across projects
